title: Norman Loves Rose
creator_credit: Direct Hit Productions, Norman Films, Basil Appleby and Henri Safran
brief_description: Norman is a sensitive, precocious 13 year old preparing for his formal entry into Jewish manhood, the bar mitzvah. He is also passionately in love with his sister-in-law, Rose, who is pregnant. Stars Carol Kane, Tony Owen with Barry Otto, Sandy Gore and Warren Mitchell.
creator_credit_for_label: Direct Hit Productions, Norman Films, Basil Appleby and Henri Safran
